A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun\, deep\,powerful\, respectful to the legacy and a wide open door for a new generation of star wars fans. Also beautifully shot\, emotionally driven action sequences and a great sense of discovery in the universe we know and love. All of this comes from a great direction from Rian Johnson from a totally different and fresh point of view. Definitely by no means a flawless movie that had pacing issues but still a great watch. I respect the negative reviews but the way is it this movie does not deserve a 53% audience score.
